009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Rotation2D;
016import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
017
018
019public class Map_Rotate implements PlugInFilter {
020        
021        static double alpha = Math.toRadians(15.0);     // angle (15 degrees)
022
023        @Override
024    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
025        return DOES_ALL;        // works for all image types
026    }
027
028        @Override
029    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
030                Mapping2D mi = new Rotation2D(alpha).getInverse(); // inverse mapping (target to source)
031                new ImageMapper(mi).map(ip);
032    }
033}
